11301.name: Cool Steel
11301.desc: A reliable steel-forged weapon that serves as a testament to the great adventures of its old master.

11302.name: Harbinger of Dawn
11302.desc: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will be blessed with a "feel-good" buff. The reflective material on the blade has long worn off.

11303.name: Traveler's Handy Sword
11303.desc: A handy steel sword which contains scissors, a magnifying glass, tinder, and other useful items in its sheath.

11304.name: Dark Iron Sword
11304.desc: A perfectly ordinary iron sword, just slightly darker than most.

11305.name: Fillet Blade
11305.desc: A sharp filleting knife. The blade is long, thin, and incredibly sharp.

11306.name: Skyrider Sword
11306.desc: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword...

11401.name: Favonius Sword
11401.desc: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!

11402.name: The Flute
11402.desc: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.

11403.name: Sacrificial Sword
11403.desc: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

11404.name: Royal Longsword
11404.desc: An old longsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Exquisitely crafted, the carvings and embellishments testify to the stature of its owner.

11405.name: Lion's Roar
11405.desc: A sharp blade with extravagant carvings that somehow does not compromise on durability and sharpness. It roars like a lion as it cuts through the air.

11406.name: Prototype Rancour
11406.desc: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts through rocks like a hot knife through butter.

11407.name: Iron Sting
11407.desc: An exotic long-bladed rapier that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders. It is light, agile, and sharp.

11408.name: Blackcliff Longsword
11408.desc: A sword made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has a dark crimson glow on its black blade.

11409.name: The Black Sword
11409.desc: A pitch-black longsword that thirsts for violence and conflict. It is said that this weapon can cause its user to become drunk on the red wine of slaughter.

11410.name: The Alley Flash
11410.desc: A straight sword as black as the night. It once belonged to a thief who roamed the benighted streets.

11413.name: Festering Desire
11413.desc: A creepy straight sword that almost seems to yearn for life. It drips with a shriveling venom that could even corrupt a mighty dragon.

11501.name: Aquila Favonia
11501.desc: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil â€” just like the last heroine who wielded it.

11502.name: Skyward Blade
11502.desc: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. The blessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.

11504.name: Summit Shaper
11504.desc: A symbol of a legendary pact, this sharp blade once cut off the peak of a mountain.

11505.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
11505.desc: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.

12301.name: Ferrous Shadow
12301.desc: A replica of the famed sword of Arundolyn, the Lion of Light. Feel the power of a legendary hero as you hold this sword in your hand! Imagine yourself as the great warrior himself! Note: Daydreaming not recommended in live combat.

12302.name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
12302.desc: A steel sword that is said to have been coated with dragon blood, rendering it invulnerable to damage. This effect is not extended to its wielder, however.

12303.name: White Iron Greatsword
12303.desc: A claymore made from white iron. Lightweight without compromising on power. Effective even when wielded by one of average strength, it is extremely deadly in the hands of a physically stronger wielder.

12305.name: Debate Club
12305.desc: A handy club made of fine steel. The most persuasive line of reasoning in any debater's arsenal.

12306.name: Skyrider Greatsword
12306.desc: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword... for the second time.

12401.name: Favonius Greatsword
12401.desc: A heavy ceremonial sword of the Knights of Favonius. It channels elemental power easily and is highly destructive.

12402.name: The Bell
12402.desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

12403.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
12403.desc: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

12404.name: Royal Greatsword
12404.desc: An old greatsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. It is made from the finest-quality materials and has stood the test of time. A weapon for use by royals only.

12405.name: Rainslasher
12405.desc: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

12406.name: Prototype Archaic
12406.desc: An ancient greatsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. It swings with such an immense force that one feels it could cut straight through reality itself.

12407.name: Whiteblind
12407.desc: An exotic sword with one section of the blade left blunt. It made its way into Liyue via the hands of foreign traders. Incredibly powerful in the hands of someone who knows how to use it.

12408.name: Blackcliff Slasher
12408.desc: An extremely sturdy greatsword from the Blackcliff Forge. It has a dark crimson color from the blade to pommel.

12409.name: Serpent Spine
12409.desc: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of the ageless waves as one swings it.

12410.name: Lithic Blade
12410.desc: A greatsword carved and chiseled from the very bedrock of Liyue.

12411.name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
12411.desc: An ancient greatsword that was stored between frescoes. Forged from Starsilver, it has the power to cleave through ice and snow.

12501.name: Skyward Pride
12501.desc: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.

12502.name: Wolf's Gravestone
12502.desc: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of iron given to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.

12504.name: The Unforged
12504.desc: Capable of driving away evil spirits and wicked people alike, this edgeless claymore seems to possess divine might.

13301.name: White Tassel
13301.desc: A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft and sharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.

13302.name: Halberd
13302.desc: A polearm with an axe blade mounted on top that can deal quite a lot of damage. It's favored by the Millelith officers.

13303.name: Black Tassel
13303.desc: An exceptionally powerful polearm that also offers a simple but elegant solution to the issue of the easily stained white tassel.

13401.name: Dragon's Bane
13401.desc: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

13402.name: Prototype Starglitter
13402.desc: A grudge discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmers along the sharp edge are like stars in the night.

13403.name: Crescent Pike
13403.desc: An exotic weapon with an extremely long blade on the top and a crescent blade at the bottom. It found its way into Liyue through foreign traders. With practice, it can deal heavy damage.

13404.name: Blackcliff Pole
13404.desc: A weapon made of blackcliff and aerosiderite. There is a dark crimson glow on its cold black sheen.

13405.name: Deathmatch
13405.desc: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Its awl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.

13406.name: Lithic Spear
13406.desc: A spear forged from the rocks of the Guyun Stone Forest. Its hardness knows no equal.

13407.name: Favonius Lance
13407.desc: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.

13408.name: Royal Spear
13408.desc: This polearm was once cherished by a member of the old nobility that governed Mondstadt long ago. Although it has never seen the light of day, it is still incomparably sharp.

13409.name: Dragonspine Spear
13409.desc: A spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.

13501.name: Staff of Homa
13501.desc: A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.

13502.name: Skyward Spine
13502.desc: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's firm resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.

13504.name: Vortex Vanquisher
13504.desc: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.

13505.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
13505.desc: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.

14301.name: Magic Guide
14301.desc: Version 12. A reprint featuring corrections to Version 11 and brand-new additions based on recent developments.

14302.name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
14302.desc: A fictional story of a band of five heroes who go off on a dragon hunt. It is poorly written and structurally incoherent. Its value lies in the many lessons that can be learned from failure.

14303.name: Otherworldly Story
14303.desc: A cheap fantasy novel with no value whatsoever. Any claim that it possesses the power of catalysis is also pure fantasy.

14304.name: Emerald Orb
14304.desc: A catalyst carved out of the hard jade from Jueyun Karst north of Liyue. It is small, light, and durable.

14305.name: Twin Nephrite
14305.desc: A jade pendant formed by piecing together two jade stones.

14401.name: Favonius Codex
14401.desc: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. It describes the logic and power of elements and matter.

14402.name: The Widsith
14402.desc: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.

14403.name: Sacrificial Fragments
14403.desc: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.

14404.name: Royal Grimoire
14404.desc: A book that once belonged to a royal mage of Mondstadt. It contains faithful and comprehensive historical accounts as well as magic spells.

14405.name: Solar Pearl
14405.desc: A dull, golden pearl made of an unknown substance that harbors the light of the sun and the moon and pulses with a warm strength.

14406.name: Prototype Amber
14406.desc: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems to glow with the very light from the sky.

14407.name: Mappa Mare
14407.desc: A nautical chart featuring nearby currents and climates that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders.

14408.name: Blackcliff Agate
14408.desc: A mysterious catalyst made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has an ominous crimson glow that seems to pulse in synchronization with the tremors from deep within the earth.

14409.name: Eye of Perception
14409.desc: A dim black glaze pearl that is said to have the power to read the purity of one's heart.

14410.name: Wine and Song
14410.desc: A songbook from the bygone aristocratic era, whose composer has become forgotten. It chronicles the tale of a certain heroic outlaw.

14412.name: Frostbearer
14412.desc: A fruit that possesses a strange, frosty will. A faint sense of agony emanates from it.

14501.name: Skyward Atlas
14501.desc: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and his former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.

14502.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
14502.desc: An educational tome written by anonymous early inhabitants who worshiped the wind. It has been blessed by the wind for its faithfulness and influence over the millennia.

14504.name: Memory of Dust
14504.desc: A stone dumbbell containing distant memories. Its endless transformations reveal the power within.

15301.name: Raven Bow
15301.desc: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. This bow's limb is decorated with raven feathers, which forebode the imminent death of its target.

15302.name: Sharpshooter's Oath
15302.desc: This superior bow once belonged to a master archer. However, it gives off a strong scent, thus making it unsuitable for hunting.

15303.name: Recurve Bow
15303.desc: It is said that this bow can shoot down eagles in flight, but ultimately how true that is depends on the skill of the archer.

15304.name: Slingshot
15304.desc: A bow, despite the name. After countless experiments and improvements to the design, the creator of the ultimate slingshot found himself to have made what was actually a bow.

15305.name: Messenger
15305.desc: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.

15401.name: Favonius Warbow
15401.desc: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archers can unleash its full potential.

15402.name: The Stringless
15402.desc: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.

15403.name: Sacrificial Bow
15403.desc: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

15404.name: Royal Bow
15404.desc: An old royal longbow that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Countless generations later, the bowstring is still tight and can still fire arrows with great force.

15405.name: Rust
15405.desc: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.

15406.name: Prototype Crescent
15406.desc: A prototype longbow discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The arrow fired from this bow glimmers like a ray of moonlight.

15407.name: Compound Bow
15407.desc: An exotic metallic bow from a distant land. Though extremely difficult to maintain, it is easy to nock and fires with tremendous force.

15408.name: Blackcliff Warbow
15408.desc: A bow made of blackcliff that features extremely sturdy bow limbs. It requires an archer with a strong bow arm to use.

15409.name: The Viridescent Hunt
15409.desc: A pure green hunting bow. This once belonged to a certain hunter whose home was the forest.

15410.name: Alley Hunter
15410.desc: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.

15413.name: Windblume Ode
15413.desc: A bow adorned with nameless flowers that bears the earnest hopes of an equally nameless person.

15501.name: Skyward Harp
15501.desc: A greatbow that symbolizes Dvalin's affiliation with the Anemo Archon. The sound of the bow firing is music to the Anemo Archon's ears. It contains the power of the sky and wind within.

15502.name: Amos' Bow
15502.desc: An extremely ancient bow that has retained its power despite its original master being long gone. It draws power from everyone and everything in the world, and the further away you are from that which your heart desires, the more powerful it is.

15503.name: Elegy for the End
15503.desc: A bow as lovely as any bard's lyre, its arrows pierce the heart like a lamenting sigh.
